title: NBA, Bill Belichick, Roger Goodell, and legacy
itunes:title: NBA, Bill Belichick, Roger Goodell, and legacy
description:
Colin explains why the NBA loves the New Orleans Pelicans Anthony Davis story, New England Patriots HC Bill Belichick recent comments, why NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell shouldn't have to comment on officials, and why the Patriots losing this Sunday wouldn't hurt QB Tom Brady's legacy. Guests include Willie McGinest, Geoff Schwartz, Danny Amendola, and T. J. Houshmandzadeh.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
